title: Halloween Heat III
description: Halloween Heat III An Anthology of Erotic Paranormal Romance Five erotic stories of love and passion, full of paranormal heat, werewolves and witches, ghosts and fae, perfect for Halloween. "The Wolf Binds the Witch" by Lilly Morgan "Mate Event" by Milly Taiden "Tied" by Lillian Diamante "Night of Seduction" by C. P. Foster "Serena" by Antonia Van Zandt
author: Lilly Morgan
